mapper.sql: select id, user_id, collection_id, collection_name, collection_number, collection_hash, link_addr, is_link, source_info, is_exist, real_company, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time from cnt_user_collection
mapper.select: select cuc.id, cuc.collection_id collectionid, cu.nick_name nickname, cu.phone phone, cuc.collection_name collectionname, cuc.collection_number collectionnumber, cuc.collection_hash collectionhash, cuc.link_addr linkaddr, cuc.is_link islink, cuc.source_info sourceinfo, cuc.real_company realcompany, cuc.created_time createdtime, cuc.updated_time updatedtime from cnt_user_collection cuc inner join cnt_user cu on cuc.user_id=cu.id where cuc.user_id=#{userid} order by cuc.created_time desc

select cuc.id, cuc.user_id, cu.nick_name nickname, cu.phone phone, cuc.collection_id collectionid, cuc.collection_name collectionname, cuc.source_info sourceinfo, cuc.collection_hash collectionhash from cnt_user_collection cuc inner join cnt_user cu on cuc.user_id=cu.id where cuc.is_link=1 order by cuc.created_time desc

SELECT user_id userId, count( id ) count FROM `cnt_user_collection` WHERE collection_id IN
#{collectionId}
and date_format(created_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(created_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and is_exist = 1
${params.dataScope} GROUP BY user_id

SELECT uc.user_id userId, count( uc.id ) count, u.phone, u.link_addr linkAddr FROM `cnt_user_collection` uc left join cnt_user u on uc.user_id=u.id
and uc.user_id = #{userId} and u.phone = #{phone} and uc.is_exist = 1
GROUP BY uc.user_id
SELECT user_id userId FROM `cnt_user_collection` WHERE collection_id = #{goodId} and is_exist = 1 GROUP BY user_id, collection_id HAVING count( id )>= #{count}
